slides.title: NitroBLAST 2024
slides.subtitle: Laying the foundation for nitrogen fixation

blocks.title: A History of Success
blocks.body: TU Delft has been participating in iGEM since 2008 - 17 years! There has hardly been a year when the university team did not take home several awards, including the Grand Prize on several occasions!

blocks.title: Taking up the Mantle
blocks.body: Our team continues this long tradition this year with our project: NitroBLAST!
